documents.content: Sunrise Medical Group in Fort Collins reported a 22% increase in prior authorization requests for anticoagulant therapies during Q3 2023. Internal audit identified processing delays affecting patients with combined venous thromboembolism and valvular heart disease. Clinical coordinator established new triage protocols effective November 15th.

Patient #FC-88245 (52 y/o male) underwent mitral valve repair at Poudre Valley Hospital on 2023-09-05. Post-op care included novel pulsed-field ablation treatment protocol not currently covered under standard Blue Cross Blue Shield benefits, requiring special exception review. Physical therapy referrals sent to Summit Rehabilitation Center.

BCBS policy update memo #2023-114 details expanded anticoagulant coverage effective January 2024 following FDA approval of new monitoring device. Implementation requires specific diagnostic codes and pre-certification documentation. Affects all in-network providers within Larimer County service area.

Survey respondent #R71902 reported satisfaction with Poudre Valley cardiac care but frustration with insurance processing delays. Patient described 6-week wait for pulsed ablation approval. Feedback forwarded to quality improvement committee at staff meeting 2023-12-04.

Research brief from Colorado State University highlights cost-effectiveness of combined mitral repair/pulsed ablation approach. Study ID CSU-CV23 tracked 142 patients through PVH cardiology department. Findings submitted to Journal of Interventional Cardiology on 2023-11-29.
